messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg’s tax plan will ensure no tax on the first £10,000 you earn, cutting most tax bills by £700.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats are fighting for investment in a green and sustainable economy.
issues.governance: The Liberal Democrats will radically reform our political system.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services.

quotes.text: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Liberal Democrats have won more votes than Labour in the last elections and are fighting for fairer taxes and ordinary families can deliver real change across Britain today.
